description: Meta said it removed more than 2 million accounts this year alone that sought to trick internet users into putting their money into fake investment schemes.
title: Meta removes millions of accounts pushing ‘pig butchering’ investment scam

description: Trump allies have discussed breaking tradition and firing opponents on the National Labor Relations Board, which also faces legal challenges from SpaceX and Amazon.
title: Amazon and SpaceX aim to defang the federal labor board. Trump may help.

description: Dozens of pages of correspondence between Elon Musk, Sam Altman and other OpenAI founders show how the conflict over control of the company is years old.
title: Elon Musk emails reveal OpenAI’s history of struggles over money and power

description: The Justice Department recommendation is one of the final moves of Biden’s aggressive antitrust enforcers, before Trump takes the reins.
title: DOJ seeks forced sale of Chrome, other big changes at Google in monopoly case
